Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 67th/South Shore
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses rrtd WB via Promontory Dr, South Shore Dr & 67th: EB via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette & Promontory Dr due to blockage nr 67th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 67th/South Shore due to street blockage near 67th/South Shore.

Westbound buses will operate via Promontory Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette and Promontory Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Southbound Reroute near Archer/Mulligan
ShortDescription: Southbound 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Central, I-55, Harlem, Archer & into the Terminal, due to street blockage near Archer/Mulligan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Central, I-55, Harlem, Archer and into the Terminal, due to street blockage near Archer/Mulligan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at Indiana
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing at Indiana due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing at Indiana due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
